name: Werf
description: Commands for werf to execute during CI/CD
helpMarkDown: Commands for werf to execute during CI/CD
author: Igor Moiseev

inputs.name: kubernetesServiceEndpoint
inputs.label: Kubernetes Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Kubernetes service connection.

inputs.name: useConfigurationFile
inputs.label: Use Configuration files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use Kubernetes configuration file or folder with the command.

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a werf command.

inputs.name: sendDockerConfigToChart
inputs.label: Send docker config to chart
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set .Values.dockerconfigjson for helm charts. --set-docker-config-json=true

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filename, directory, or URL to kubernetes configuration files that will be used with the commands.

inputs.name: werfDir
inputs.label: Configuration File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filename, directory, or URL to kubernetes configuration files that will be used with the commands.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Command arguments.

inputs.name: layerRepo
inputs.label: Repository for layers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Repository name for layers in given docker configuration

inputs.name: containerRegistryType
inputs.label: Container Registry type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Container registry type.

inputs.name: dockerRegistryEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Registry Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker registry connection. Required for commands that need to authenticate with a registry.

inputs.name: azureSubscriptionEndpoint
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure subscription, which has your Azure Container Registry.
inputs.visibleRule: containerRegistryType = Azure Container Registry &&  command != helm

inputs.name: azureContainerRegistry
inputs.label: Azure Container Registry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Container Registry. Required for commands that need to authenticate with a registry.
inputs.visibleRule: containerRegistryType = Azure Container Registry  &&  command != helm

inputs.name: versionOrLocation
inputs.label: Choose werf version or exact location or uri to download

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version Spec of version to get.  Examples: 1.1, 1.2

inputs.name: versionChannel
inputs.label: Werf channel to download
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select stability channel

inputs.name: specifyLocation
inputs.label: Path to werf binary
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full path to the werf

inputs.name: specifyUri
inputs.label: Uri to werf binary
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uri to custom werf build

inputs.name: user
inputs.label: User for download
inputs.helpMarkDown: User for download

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password for download
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for download

inputs.name: downloadOnce
inputs.label: Download once
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should it be downloaded only once or every build

inputs.name: namespace
inputs.label: Namespace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the namespace to run the command in.
